Sentence having been pronounced, the ceremony of degradation began. The bishops clothed their prisoner in the sacerdotal habit, and as he took the priestly robe, he said, \93Our Lord Jesus Christ was covered with a white robe by way of insult, when Herod had him conducted before Pilate.\94 Being again exhorted to retract, he replied, turning toward 
109
the people, \93With what face, then, should I behold the heavens? How should I look on those multitudes of men to whom I have preached the pure gospel? No; I esteem their salvation more than this poor body, now appointed unto death.\94 The vestments were removed one by one, each bishop pronouncing a curse as he performed his part of the ceremony. Finally a crown or mitre, on which were painted frightful figures of demons, and bearing the inscription, \93The Arch-Heretic,\94 was placed upon his head. \93Most joyfully,\94 he said, \93will I wear this crown of shame for thy sake, O Lord Jesus, who for me didst wear a crown of thorns.\94
